attributes.additional_details:
Having enjoyed a fantastic beginning to the season with Newton Athletic Doves in the CDFL, Rob Nicholson is due to start University in York in September.

Rob has attained a strike rate of 5 goals in 3 games as the 'Doves' sit top of the table.

If this petition gets 100 signatures, Rob has agreed to shun University in order to continue his blistering start to the season. 'The Brain' has also promised to square some balls to fellow forward Daniel Christian if this petition passes.
